about_the_game:
You are cast out of your parents home, forced to become an adult and abandon the delinquent life.
At the same time in a remote mountainous region, a heavy storm caused great damages to a small town. Particularly affected is an ancient inn. Keiko, the inn's hostess, is struggling to keep the inn alive and running as is, having lost her mother recently, and her husband always absent, not wanting to be involved in any form with the inn and spending the majority of the time away at the city.

Heavily inspired by romantic ecchi anime, manga and dating sims from the 90's and 00's.



Features:
  • Romance: Build relationships with the inn's residents and guests. Experience touching moments through events and CGs, and decide how to spend your time with them.

  • Inn Work: Perform tasks such as repairs, cleaning, and gardening to keep the inn running smoothly. Unlock and invest in new areas to help the inn prosper. Your efforts directly impact guest satisfaction and the inn's reputation.

  • Daily Life: As you gain experience at the inn and meet new people, you will become a vital part of the community. Participate in local events and uncover hidden secrets. Each character, romanceable or not, has their own life, daily routines, and personality. Decide how to spend your day and deepen your connections with guests and locals.

  • Guests: As the inn's popularity grows, more guests will arrive. They will spend a few days at the inn before returning to their normal lives. If they enjoy their stay, they might return for a much-needed rest.

  • Harem: The game is designed so that all content can be played on a single save file, allowing you to romance multiple characters simultaneously. However, most characters won't appreciate seeing you openly display affection towards other love interests.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.
